alert.note: Alert for Butte; Harding; Northern Meade Co Plains; Perkins; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 28 at 2:35AM MST until December 28 at 12:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Harding County, Butte County, Perkins County, Ziebach County and the Northern Meade County Plains. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Cheyenne River Reservation. * WHEN...Until noon MST today. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: A wind chill advisory means the combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. If you go outside, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands.

area.areaDesc: Butte; Harding; Northern Meade Co Plains; Perkins; Ziebach
